title: Man Artist

nouns: A person whose creative work shows sensitivity and imagination
An artist is a person engaged in one or more of any of a broad spectrum of activities related to creating art, practicing the arts, and/or demonstrating an art.
Person who creates art.
A person with creative talent who produces artworks.
Person who practises in the arts
A person who creates art.
Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
An adult male human.
A man is a male human.
An adult male human
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
A color reproduction
All the colours available to a device such as a monitor or printer.
All the colours available to a device.
The particular range of colors that a device or color model is able to produce.
A certain complete subset of colors
An array that contains color values identifying the colors that can currently be displayed or drawn on the output device.
In color reproduction, including computer graphics and photography, the gamut, or color gamut, is a certain complete subset of colors.
The subset of colors which can be accurately represented in a given circumstance, such as within a given color space or by a certain output device.

description: A man engaged in the visual art of painting, shown holding a palette and paintbrush.
apple_vendor_description: The man artist emoji, as rendered on Apple devices, depicts a focused individual with a beret perched jauntily on his head and a paint-splattered smock, embodying creative passion. Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting bring the artist to life, highlighting the texture of his clothing and the thoughtful expression on his face. On Apple devices, this emoji is a vibrant symbol of creativity, art, and the act of bringing imagination into form.
